name: The Mountain Has Exploded and I Don't Want to Die
name_original: The Mountain Has Exploded and I Don't Want to Die
description:
The mountain has exploded! Dodge the debris and collect food to stay alive! How long can you survive?!

Controls:

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

Space Bar - Give yourself a little boost

This is my first completed project, please feel free to leave feedback!
